鏴字的基本解释

鏴
lù
古代有金黄色装饰的车。
化学元素“镥”的旧译。

鏴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《玉篇》力故切］
(1)金路。金饰之车。见《篇海类编·珍宝类·金部》。
(2)作人名用字明有洛川王、朱翊鏴，见《明史·赵王高燧传》。

鏴字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏴； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1321第09
【玉篇】力故切，音路。【篇海】金路。

鏴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鏴字的起名意思

金路。金饰之车。

鏴
Basic explanation of words
鏴
lù
An ancient car with golden decorations.
The old translation of the chemical element "Lutetium".
鏴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Jade Pian" is so strong]
(1) Golden Road. Car with gold ornaments. See "Pianhai Series · Treasures · Golden Ministry".
(2) The characters used in the names of people are clearly known as Luochuan Wang and Zhu Yihuan, see "Ming History·The Biography of Zhao Wang Gaosui".
鏴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏴; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1321 Page 09
【Jade articles】Strength so cut, sound path. 【Article Sea】Golden Road.
